channel.title: Positive Financial Performance on FinanClub

item.title: TEVA
item.description: score:969 Chances: Teva has reached an agreement to settle claims with U.S. hospitals, agreeing to pay up to $126 million over 18 years and provide anti-overdose drug naloxone. TEVA’s strong second-quarter results beat estimates for both earnings and sales, indicating positive financial performance.
